duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and manage new applications using the latest standards, methodologies, and frameworks.
Enhance, debug, support, maintain, and test software applications that support business units or supporting functions.
Participate in the design, development, and implementation of complex applications, often using new technologies.
Serve as a fully seasoned/proficient technical resource, working under minimal supervision and with general guidance from more seasoned tech leads.
Demonstrate a record of developing successful applications that are highly integrated and reliable.
Operate effectively and with a sense of responsibility in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
Adhere to Enterprise Data Management Standards.
Design and implement the overall web architecture.
Be comfortable with both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks, and third-party libraries.
Understand and convert macro level requirements into actionable tasks.
Understand the continuous integration and continuous deployment lifecycle.
Understand threat modeling concepts and how to implement them.
Understand accessibility standards and how to implement them.
Adhere to Enterprise Data Management Standards.
Design and implement the overall web architecture.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
